TypeSignature.Value: public interface PlainTextContentControl : IDisposable, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContentControlBase, System.ComponentModel.IComponent, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

.class public interface auto ansi abstract PlainTextContentControl implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContentControlBase, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 表示文档中的文本块。

span.span: Represents a block of text in a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A只能包含文本。A can contain only text. 你可以设置中的文本的格式，但所有控件中的文本自动具有相同的格式。You can format the text in a , but all of the text in the control automatically has the same formatting. 例如，如果是中的句子的一个字设，该控件中的所有文本为都斜体。For example, if you italicize one word of a sentence that is in a , all the text inside the control is italicized. 若要访问中的文本，使用属性。To access the text in a , use the property. 默认情况下，不能包含换行符。By default, a cannot contain line breaks. 若要更改此行为，请使用属性。To change this behavior, use the property. 若要创建可以包含文本和许多其他类型的内容，包括表格、 图片或其他内容控件的文档区域使用。To create a document region that can contain text and many other types of content, including tables, pictures, or other content controls, use a . [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 内容控件Content Controls 是八个类型的内容控件，可以使用设计文档和 Microsoft Office Word 中的模板之一。The is one of eight types of content controls that you can use to design documents and templates in Microsoft Office Word. 内容控件具有用户界面 (UI)，具有控制类似于窗体的输入。Content controls have a user interface (UI) that has controlled input like a form. 你可以使用内容控件来防止用户编辑受保护的部分的文档或模板，并还可以将内容控件绑定到数据源。You can use content controls to prevent users from editing protected sections of the document or template, and you can also bind content controls to a data source. 有关详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加一个新到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 此版本用于文档级自定义。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddTextControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddTextControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#600](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/PlainText.cs#600)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#600](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/PlainText.vb#600)] 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddTextControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddTextControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#600](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/PlainText.cs#600)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#600](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/PlainText.vb#600)]

summary.span: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 当前实例的 。

span.span: Gets a that represents the current instance of Microsoft Office Word.

value.span: 一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 当前实例的 。

span.span: A that represents the current instance of Microsoft Office Word.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开有关 Word，应用于该实例的选项的当前实例的信息以及在实例中打开当前文档。The property exposes information about the current instance of Word, the options applied to that instance, and the current documents open within the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Copy() cil managed

summary.span: 将 从文档复制到剪贴板。

span.span: Copies the from the document to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用方法时，原始保留在文档。When you use the method, the original remains on the document. 一份（包括所有文本和属性设置) 将添加到剪贴板。A copy of the , including all text and property settings, is added to the Clipboard.

summary.span: 获取一个 32 位整数，该整数指示已在其中创建 的应用程序。

span.span: Gets a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the was created.

value.span: 一个 32 位整数，该整数指示已在其中创建该控件的应用程序。

span.span: A 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the control was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 Word 中，创建属性返回表示字符串的十六进制数 4d535744， `MSWD`。If the was created in Word, the property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string `MSWD`. 此字符串是 Word 的四个字符创建者代码。This string is the four-character creator code for Word.

summary.span: 从文档中移除 ，然后将其添加到剪贴板中。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用方法时，原始从文档中移除。When you use the method, the original is removed from the document. 一份（包括所有文本和属性设置) 将添加到剪贴板。A copy of the , including all text and property settings, is added to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要阻止用户编辑的内容，使用属性。To prevent users from editing the contents of a , use the property. 有关如何使用若要保护的文档的一部分，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[如何： 使用内容控件保护文档的某些部分](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md)。For more information about how to use a to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md).

value.span: 如果不能编辑 的内容，则为 ；如果可以编辑控件内容，则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要阻止用户删除从文档中，使用属性。To prevent users from deleting a from the document, use the property. 有关使用若要保护的文档的一部分，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[如何： 使用内容控件保护文档的某些部分](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md)。For more information about using a to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md).

value.span: 如果 可以包含换行符，则为 ；否则为 。

summary.span: 获取 的父级。

span.span: Gets the parent of the .

value.span: 一个对象，表示 的父级。

span.span: An object that represents the parent of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父级是控件所在的对象。The parent of the is the object in which the control is contained. 例如，如果控件在文档的正文，则此属性将返回对象。For example, if the control is in the body of the document, this property will return a object. 要获取其父类的中包含或，使用属性。To get the parent of a that is contained in a or a , use the property.

summary.span: 获取嵌套在另一个内容控件内的 的父内容控件。

span.span: Gets the parent content control of a that is nested in another content control.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 嵌套在其中的内容控件；如果 未嵌套在另一个内容控件中，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the content control in which the is nested; if the is not nested in another content control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和控件是可以包含嵌套的内容控件的内容控件的唯一类型。The and controls are the only types of content controls that can contain nested content controls.

summary.span: 获取或设置在用户操作或某个其他操作更改文本之前在 中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the until the text is changed by a user action or some other operation.

value.span: 在用户操作或某个其他操作更改文本之前，在控件中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed in the control until the text is changed by a user action or some other operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户编辑控件、 控件中填充数据的源的数据或者控件的内容被删除之前，会显示的占位符文本。The placeholder text is displayed until a user edits the control, the control is populated with data from a data source, or the control's contents are deleted. 若要设置中的占位符文本或，使用方法。To set the placeholder text to text that is in a or a , use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加一个新到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 该示例设置为一个字符串，将提示用户键入他或她的名字的属性。The example sets the property to a string that prompts the user to type his or her first name. 此版本用于文档级自定义。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddTextControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddTextControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#600](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/PlainText.cs#600)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#600](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/PlainText.vb#600)] 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddTextControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddTextControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#600](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/PlainText.cs#600)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#600](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/PlainText.vb#600)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问控件和其他文本属性中的文本的格式。Use the property to access the formatting of the text in the control and other text properties. 有关详细信息对象，请参阅[Word 对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see [Word Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview.md). 若要访问文本中显示，使用属性。To access only the text that is displayed in the , use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetPlaceholderText (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock BuildingBlock = null, Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range = null, string Text = "");

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetPlaceholderText(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock BuildingBlock, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, string Text) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the placeholder text.
A that contains the placeholder text.
The placeholder text.

summary.span: 将 、 或字符串中的文本显示为 中的占位符文本。

span.span: Displays text that is in a , a , or a string as the placeholder text in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户编辑控件、 控件中填充数据的源的数据或者控件的内容被删除之前，会显示的占位符文本。The placeholder text is displayed until a user edits the control, the control is populated with data from a data source, or the control's contents are deleted. 在调用时使用唯一的参数之一方法。Only one of the parameters is used when you call the method. 如果指定多个参数，则 Microsoft Office Word 将使用第一个指定的参数。If more than one parameter is specified, Microsoft Office Word uses the first specified parameter. 如果所有参数都被都省略，占位符文本是空字符串。If all parameters are omitted, the placeholder text is an empty string. 若要获取的占位符文本，使用属性。To get the placeholder text of a , use the property. 你还可以使用此属性将占位符文本设置为一个字符串。You can also use this property to set the placeholder text to a string.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定 当前是否显示占位符文本。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the is currently displaying placeholder text.

value.span: 如果 当前显示占位符文本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is currently displaying placeholder text; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的文本之前会显示的占位符文本由用户操作或一些其他操作更改。The placeholder text is displayed until the text in the is changed by a user action or some other operation. 若要获取或设置占位符文本，请使用属性或方法。To get or set the placeholder text, use the property or the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置要与 关联的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that you want to associate with the .

value.span: 一个要与 关联的字符串。

span.span: A string that you want to associate with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来存储与关联的字符串文档处于打开状态时。You can use the property to store a string that is associated with the while the document is open. 若要查找由其标记的内容控件，使用方法。To find a content control by its tag, use the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在编辑 时是否自动将该控件从文档中删除。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the is automatically deleted from the document when the control is edited.

value.span: 如果要在编辑 时自动将该控件删除，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is automatically deleted when the control is edited; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`、当用户在控件中，键入或以编程方式更改控件中的文本自动删除。If the property is `true`, the is automatically deleted when the user types in the control, or when the text in the control is changed programmatically. 当自动从文档，该控件将保持在文档中的文本中删除。When the is automatically deleted from the document, the text in the control remains in the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要访问控件和其他文本属性中的文本的格式，使用属性。To access the formatting of the text in the control and other text properties, use the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the .

value.span: 的标题。

span.span: The title of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标题显示在边框当用户单击它。The title is displayed in the border of the when the user clicks it.

summary.span: 获取一个 ，表示 与自定义 XML 部件中元素之间的绑定。

span.span: Gets an that represents the binding between the and an element in a custom XML part.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 与自定义 XML 部件中元素之间的绑定。

span.span: An that represents the binding between the and an element in a custom XML part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性将绑定到一种 XML 中的元素 (也名为*自定义 XML 部件*) 嵌入在文档中。Use the property to bind a to an element in a piece of XML (also named *custom XML part*) that is embedded in the document. 有关详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[自定义 XML 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md). ## Examples 有关代码示例演示如何使用属性，请参阅[演练： 将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md)。For a code example that demonstrates how to use the property, see [Walkthrough: Binding Content Controls to Custom XML Parts](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md).
